title: Bug 3666 - Hungry code assist eats too much code
description: Under certain circumstances, code assist in the UI eats too much code. Consider the enclosed class. As a programmer, I must add a parameter to the baz call in bar to make the program correct.
OB: Code assist in the UI is eating too much code.
EB: Code assist in the UI should only provide options and suggestions up to the point where the cursor is located, without consuming the surrounding code.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Change the baz call to baz(x.x.foo())
2. Place the cursor after the first "x."
3. Press CtrlSpace to bring up code assist
4. Type "f" to filter the list
5. Select "foo()"
